headline: L’Oréal Acquires Color Wow
summary: The hair care brand started by serial entrepreneur Gail Federici will live in the Professional Products Division.

headline: Is Procter & Gamble Set to Shield Earnings From Global Volatility?
summary: PG leans on pricing, cost efficiency, productivity and brand strength to protect margins as global volatility clouds earnings outlook.

headline: Church & Dwight to Webcast Discussion of Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Results on August 1
summary: Church & Dwight Co., Inc. will webcast a discussion of its second quarter earnings results on Friday, August 1, 2025, beginning at 10:00 a.m. ET.Media and investors may access the live audio...

headline: 2 Consumer Stocks to Consider Right Now and 1 to Turn Down
summary: Consumer staples stocks are solid insurance policies in frothy markets ripe for corrections. But they’re also double-edged swords as they often lag in booming conditions, and this pattern has persisted recently. Over the past six months, the industry has recorded a loss of 10.5%, a far cry from the S&P 500’s 4.5% ascent.
